scripts.all: pnpm run clean && pnpm run format && pnpm run check && pnpm run build && pnpm run test  && pnpm run deploy:anvil
scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules .turbo out broadcast cache && pnpm chain:kill
scripts.deploy:anvil: export CHAIN=anvil ACCOUNT=anvil-deployer && pnpm deploy:deploy --password '' && pnpm run deploy:validate
scripts.deploy:mainnet: export ACCOUNT=mainnet-deployer && pnpm deploy:deploy --verify && pnpm run deploy:validate
scripts.deploy:testnet: export ACCOUNT=testnet-deployer && pnpm deploy:deploy --verify && pnpm run deploy:validate
